description: Example of an AI Board Meeting where agents collaborate to make trading decisions

transcript.speaker: CIO
transcript.message: Good morning team. Markets open in 5 minutes. Let's review the plan.

transcript.speaker: SCOUT
transcript.message: Pre-market scan complete. Top movers: NVDA +2.5%, AMD +1.8%, META +1.2%. All have volume >2x average. NVDA looks strongest.

transcript.speaker: NEWS
transcript.message: Overnight developments: Fed minutes released, dovish tone. 2 biotech FDA approvals. Market sentiment shifted bullish overnight.

transcript.speaker: CATALYST
transcript.message: Today's events: NVDA earnings after close. AMD product launch at 11 AM. META has no major catalysts today.

transcript.speaker: RISK
transcript.message: Portfolio status: 2 open positions, 60% allocation. Max drawdown -1.2%. We have room for 1-2 more positions.

transcript.speaker: PATTERN
transcript.message: Technical analysis: NVDA breaking above resistance. AMD in ascending triangle. META consolidating.

transcript.speaker: HARVEY
transcript.message: Synthesis: Strong pre-market setup. NVDA is the clear leader with earnings catalyst. AMD secondary play. META less compelling.

transcript.speaker: CIO
transcript.message: Excellent analysis team. Decision: Focus on NVDA as primary opportunity. Monitor AMD for confirmation. Skip META for now. SCOUT, continue scanning. RISK, watch allocation. Let's have a great day.

decisions.rationale: Strong gap-up, volume surge, earnings catalyst, breakout pattern
Good setup but secondary to NVDA. Watch for confirmation.
Less compelling setup compared to NVDA and AMD

meeting.outcome: High-conviction focus on NVDA. System ready for market open.

note: This demonstrates how AI agents collaborate in Board Meetings. Production meetings include real-time agent interactions and decision-making.
